DOC.brief_summary: This grant support 12-month randomized control trial compare usual care versus collaborative disease management Internet among disadvantaged African-Americans Type 2 diabetes . The project aim : ( 1 ) determine effect case-managed , Web-based diabetes care glycemic control , health care utilization , self-efficacy , patient satisfaction ; ( 2 ) qualitatively identify enablers successful use computer , Internet , e-Health application disadvantage patient .
DOC.brief_title: Determining Effect Patients Internet-Based Diabetes Disease Management
DOC.detailed_description: We propose conduct 12-month randomize control trial compare usual care versus chronic disease management Internet among disadvantaged African-Americans type 2 diabetes . Subjects recruit patient receive primary care Harborview Medical Center , County facility administer University Washington Seattle . As part pretest-posttest experimental design , 30 intervention subject train use exist diabetes disease-management module comprise six Web site access home via link display within University 's `` MyUW '' Internet portal . These site allow patient : 1 . View entire electronic medical record , record use provider , 2 . Upload blood glucose reading store digital meter , 3 . Enter medication , nutrition , exercise information online daily diary , 4 . Communicate provider regard treatment recommendation question use clinical e-mail , 5 . Obtain additional information traditional patient education site endorse content , 6 . Employ second education site collaboratively generate action plan intend enhance self-efficacy . All data view patient provider online trend display clinical pharmacist use review case less often weekly . As attention control , 30 subject also train use provide personal computer access Internet knowledge resource , access case-management service module evaluate . By compare two group , aim : 1 . Determine effect case-managed , Web-based diabetes care glycemic control , healthcare utilization , self-efficacy , patient satisfaction , 2 . Use semi-structured interview among subsample trial arm qualitatively identify enablers successful use computer , Internet , e-health application disadvantage patient .
